TradePending Video is a visual communication app.

TradePending Video's Google Chrome extension allows TradePending Video users to record videos and access their library from any Google Chrome page. Easily add videos to your emails, CRM, DMS and more, without leaving the page youâ€™re on!

TradePending Video is a simple & reliable automotive video tool that increases:

- Dealership Revenue
- Showroom Visits

- CSI Scores


Install the extension today and begin to capture the attention of your customers. You will soon see the impact TradePending Video makes to your business and sales.
